nodes.bodyText: Why is this property true for a release build? I may be missing something but this property being true and eql.enabled  being true as well below, means EQL is enabled in a release build, which is incorrect?

I am following the same pattern as CCR here. The setting exist only in the snapshot build unless we have this environment variable set, then it shows up in the release build as well. This way we test it in both release and snapshot builds only through slightly different mechanisms.
Why not all parameters on a single line?
Maybe better as size must be greater than 0?
Maybe use one line for these?
fetchSize is required to be strictly positive in EqlSearchRequest.
I think fetchSize is missing from these checks.
To me it looks more common to return hits and less common to return null and I would have switched between them. But that's a personal preference.
